title: truncating git warning
body:
A user who can name himself if he likes, reported

```shell
(base) SENSORED@SENSORED DataLad % datalad clone https://github.com/PennLINC/HBN_BIDS hbn_bids                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
[WARNING] the following paths have collided (e.g. case-sensitive paths                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
[INFO   ] Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
[INFO   ] https://github.com/PennLINC/HBN_BIDS/config download failed: Not Found                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
install(ok): /Users/ALMOSTMISSED/Data/DataLad/hbn_bids (dataset) 
```

For me it has no warning

```shell
$> datalad install https://github.com/PennLINC/HBN_BIDS
Clone attempt:   0%|                                  | 0.00/2.00 [00:00<?, ? Candidate locations/s^[INFO   ] scanning for annexed files (this may take some time)                                      
[INFO   ] Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore                               
[INFO   ] https://github.com/PennLINC/HBN_BIDS/config download failed: Not Found 
install(ok): /tmp/HBN_BIDS (dataset)
```

so might relate to the version of `git` or OS (user is likely on OSX).

from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/63468346/case-sensitive-path-collisions-on-case-insensitive-file-system-when-i-do-git-clo it looks like the full warning is like

```
warning: the following paths have collided (e.g. case-sensitive paths
on a case-insensitive filesystem) and only one from the same
colliding group is in the working tree:

  'components/User/index.js'
  'components/user/index.js'
```

not sure how much we should parse/channel but just wanted to report the odd reporting here leaving it unknown for what path collision actually happened (shouldn't be for the name of the repo since explicitly mapped into lower case).

Dear user, if you are listening, what do you see if you just do `git clone https://github.com/PennLINC/HBN_BIDS hbn_bids`?
